thread.title: Unisys to Webcast 2015 Americas Analyst and Advisor Summit
thread.title_full: Unisys to Webcast 2015 Americas Analyst and Advisor Summit

title: Unisys to Webcast 2015 Americas Analyst and Advisor Summit
text:
Unisys to Webcast 2015 Americas Analyst and Advisor Summit   Published on 2015-09-11 07:17:44 Unisys to Webcast 2015 Americas Analyst and Advisor Summit -- BLUE BELL, Pa., Sept.   <-   BLUE BELL, Pa. , Sept.   Unisys Corporation (NYSE: UIS ) said today that it will webcast general session presentations at its 2015 Americas Analyst and Advisor Summit on Monday, September 14 in Dallas, Texas . At the summit, the Unisys leadership team will discuss the company's strategic growth initiatives with industry analysts and third-party advisors. A number of Unisys clients will also present at the summit. The general session will begin at 2 p.m. Eastern Time . Unisys will provide access to a live webcast of the general session on the Unisys Investor Web site at www.unisys.com/investor . A replay of the webcast will be available on the Unisys Investor Web site shortly after the live event. About Unisys Unisys is a global information technology company that solves organizations' most pressing IT and business challenges. With more than 20,000 employees serving clients around the world, our offerings include cloud and infrastructure services, application services, security solutions, and high-end server technology. For more information, visit www.unisys.com . Follow Unisys on Twitter and LinkedIn . RELEASE NO.: 0911/9356 Unisys and other Unisys products and services mentioned herein, as well as their respective logos, are trademarks or registered trademarks of Unisys Corporation. Any other brand or product referenced herein is acknowledged to be a trademark or registered trademark of its respective holder. 
SOURCE Unisys Corporation
